summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of the ColorF class that contains the specified red, green, blue, and alpha values.

param.name: red
param.para: The red component of the color to be constructed.

param.name: green
param.para: The green component of the color to be constructed.

param.name: blue
param.para: The blue component of the color to be constructed.

param.name: alpha
param.para: The alpha value of the color to be constructed. An alpha channel value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0, where 0.0 represents a fully transparent color and 1.0 represents a fully opaque color.The default value is 1.0.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of the ColorF class that contains the specified RGB and alpha values.

param.name: rgb
param.para: The RGB value for the color to be constructed.

param.name: a
param.para: The alpha value for the color to be constructed. An alpha channel value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0, where 0.0 represents a fully transparent color and 1.0 represents a fully opaque color. The default value is 1.0.
